name: Yasha and Kaya
description: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance.
16 main attack damage to Agility/Intelligence heroes.
14.4 main attack damage to universal heroes.
Multiple sources of movement speed do not stack.
Multiple sources of attack speed fully stack.
Multiple sources of spell damage amplification do not stack.
Multiple sources of mana regeneration amplification do not stack.
